issue.message: Use of synchronized methods is not recommended
Use of synchronized methods is not recommended
Use of synchronized methods is not recommended

This call is to a method from API 30, the call containing class androidx.sqlite.db.framework.FrameworkSQLiteDatabase is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 30. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(30) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(30).

This call is to a method from API 16, the call containing class androidx.sqlite.db.framework.FrameworkSQLiteDatabase is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 16.
